== Gokarn (603419) ==
      
Gokarn is a village in the [[Kumta ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1700.14 hectares and harbouring 3038 households with total population of 13539 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[KUMTA]] is at a distance of 32 km. Male population is 6827 and female population is 6712. Scheduled Caste Population is 783 and Scheduled Tribes population is 12. Census Location Code of the village is 603419<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
